title: About the soon to be- Gatekeeper Galio
body: What do you expect from his update? Like the current one, demon-like with green-ish effects? or more in the underworld direction? I hope they keep him in the current thematic that he guards the gates to the afterlife and makes sure what dies stays there, basically opening up a lot of taunt for shadow isles champs. I hope for everything, new effects animations a big new vo not the current 3 Minute stuff. Anything you hope for? why not make a discussion out of this?

replies.body: It's going to be lit fam ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jhNEAeEy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-26T22:30:23.314+0000)
>
> It's going to be lit fam ;)

Sounds like you are pretty far with him already O.O
Well that team has been working on Galio since Yorick shipped.
From one gothic champion to another. They may need a different genre for their next project just to take a break from it all.
Well I mean choices vary between Mordekaiser, Evelynn, Pantheon, Rammus, Nunu, Swain, Dr. Mundo, etc. I'd say there's a fair bit of variety there.
I vote Nunu. Just for the absolute insanity you could bring.
Nunu's gotta be super high in priority at this point. I know Morde, Evelynn and Swain are of course among the most needed, but god damn a Nunu VGU has so much potential.
Even in vgu lists people forget urgot. So sad.
He's been there for so long that people kinda started to forget about him entirely.
It's a kid on a yeti. LET'S GO WILD!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jhNEAeEy,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-26T23:39:13.003+0000)
>
> Well I mean choices vary between Mordekaiser, Evelynn, Pantheon, Rammus, Nunu, Swain, Dr. Mundo, etc. I'd say there's a fair bit of variety there.

I respect the fact completely that SWAIN {{champion:50}}  was mentioned he so  badass  he needs his moment.. i mean cmon that transfromation with the spewing birds i feel like its screaming for something scary looking .. really make players Say O SHIT here comes swain

> [{quoted}](name=C4 SAMMiCH,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jhNEAeEy,comment-id=000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-12-27T09:52:11.584+0000)
>
> I respect the fact completely that SWAIN {{champion:50}}  was mentioned he so  badass  he needs his moment.. i mean cmon that transfromation with the spewing birds i feel like its screaming for something scary looking .. really make players Say O SHIT here comes swain

I love having Swain on my team... because at my Elo nobody counterbuilds anyone so it's great with my Soraka pick :3

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jhNEAeEy,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-26T23:17:24.168+0000)
>
> From one gothic champion to another. They may need a different genre for their next project just to take a break from it all.

Next champion confirmed to be a fluffy cloud with a smiley face on it?
Will it be a long wait between WW and Galio?
Probably not. Warwick's probably gonna be within a month or so.

https://i.gyazo.com/278aa6872d1c1020fcc12edbe2832f8b.jpg

Galio confirmed to be lit.
I just want a good /dance XD

Hey! i like the Beauty and the Beast dance

although with that skin it would be cool to have like a spectral woman dance with him
Is it the same team that worked on yorick? If so awesome. Yorick is one of my favorite champions.
Indeed it is. The Yorick group was also the Taric group if memory serves.
Actually the team that did Poppy & Yorick are working on Galio. The team that did Taric & Ryze are working on Warwick.

A small question:
Who did Shen?

I was always confused about how he popped up between Poppy and Taric,when we have only 2 teams.

G-mang was the designer. He is on the systems team now. Shen was done by the team that was previously doing VUs as it was in transition to become a full VGU team. This is why Shen looks like what our old VUs looked like but with some smaller gameplay changes. More of a 2.0 Shen rather then a full re-imaging like our full VGUs are today.
Are there any other champs you feel could do with a light VU like Shen's?
do you think you'd do something like go back and just give shen new voice lines and a recall? I guess you probably just want to keep moving forward

Strange, very strange... I dislike Poppy very much and think she is toxic, but Yorick has become my new main and all time favorite champion. I dislike Ryze very much and think he is toxic, but Taric was and is one of my favorite champions thematically (plus his kit now is super fun and well designed imo). Sooo... I have no clue how Galio and Warwick will turn out lol they could either be my new favorites or I will hate them in every way.  

Out of curiosity who worked on Malzahar?
Malz was done by the class update team. RiotRepetior was the designer on Malz though. He was also the designer on Taric and Ryze. CertainlyT is the designer on Warwick.

>CertainlyT is the designer on Warwick.

Going to have to admit, that scares the shit out of me.
There is to be said, flat true damage could be good on warwick so he does not live or die by reaching the enemy carry and can shred tanks too.

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jhNEAeEy,comment-id=00010000000100010001,timestamp=2016-12-27T10:44:00.978+0000)
>
> Malz was done by the class update team. RiotRepetior was the designer on Malz though. He was also the designer on Taric and Ryze. CertainlyT is the designer on Warwick.

I'm curious to see what the end result will be :)
Poppy has always been toxic lol.

Oh my bad. 

Did the Galio team do Gangplank and Sion? Just curious.

That was back when there was only one VGU team. Members from that team are spread across both teams now. RiotScruffy was the designer on Sion, who is now design lead of new champions. Statikk was the designer on Gangplank who is now design lead of champion updates.
Ah ok that makes sense. I assumed you had one rework team that was still going and drafted up a second one from scratch so to speak. Thanks for enlightening me!

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jhNEAeEy,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-12-26T23:40:40.379+0000)
>
> Indeed it is. The Yorick group was also the Taric group if memory serves.

Wow Taric is my 4th most played. Who is this group? I wish they could do all the reworks and I bet I'd find more champions to love. Whoever did Ivern did an excellent job as well.
I just hope Galio will be able to go jungling after the rework, right now he is my favourite jungler. Maybe not the most effective ( looking at you Skarner/Sion) but the most fun.

Gatekeeper Galio will get a new VO, Splash art, model, sfx and vfx

ALL IN ONE!!!
